Field Detail

followedUniverse

private GroupDescriptor followedUniverse
The local universe to which this node belongs. Each node can only belong to a single universe which would be its local universe!

leadedUniverse

private GroupDescriptor leadedUniverse
If the node is a universe leader then this is the universe it leads.

notifyPacketArrived

public void notifyPacketArrived(java.lang.String subject,
                                polimi.reds.NodeDescriptor sender,
                                java.io.Serializable packet)
This method is called by the Overlay whenever a new packet arrives from a neighbor of the local node.

Specified by:
notifyPacketArrived in interface polimi.reds.broker.overlay.PacketListener
Parameters:
subject - the subject the packet was addressed to.
source - the NodeDescriptor of the neighbor the packet comes from.
data - the received packet.
